publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4835 Ross Finnie: The Draft Animal Health and Welfare (Scotland) Act 2006 (Consequential Provisions) Order 2006—That the Environment and Rural Development Committee recommends that the draft Animal Health and Welfare (Scotland) Act 2006 (Consequential Provisions) Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: Rhona Brankin*

S2M-4835 Ross Finnie: The Draft Animal Health and Welfare (Scotland) Act 2006 (Consequential Provisions) Order 2006—That the Environment and Rural Development Committee recommends that the draft Animal Health and Welfare (Scotland) Act 2006 (Consequential Provisions) Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: Rhona Brankin
